00015 /*
00016  *      Macro Definition Section
00017  */
00018 #define VGA_MISC_REGISTER       0x3CC
00019 #define VGA_CURSOR_POS_HIGH_PORT 0x0E
00020 #define VGA_CURSOR_POS_LOW_PORT 0x0F
00021 #define VGA_MAX_SCAN_LINE_REGISTER 0x09
00022 #define VGA_CURSOR_START_REGISTER 0x0A
00023 #define VGA_CURSOR_END_REGISTER 0x0B
00024 #define VGA_INPUT_STATUS_REGISTER 0X3DA
00025 #define VGA_ADDRESS_DATA_REGISTER 0X3C0
00026 #define VGA_DATA_READ_REGISTER 0x3C1
00027 #define colorMask(c)                    ((c << 4)  + (c >> 4))
00028 #define getOffset(row,col) 2 * ( (row) * SCREEN_WIDTH + (col) )

00035 static short cursorOffset = getOffset(CURSOR_START_ROW, CURSOR_START_COL);
00036 
00037 static int cursorRow = CURSOR_START_ROW;
00038 
00039 static int cursorCol = CURSOR_START_COL;
00040 
00041 static int cursorVisibility = 1;
00042

00062 static void fillLine ( int c )
00063 {
00064         int i;
00065         for ( i = cursorOffset; i < VIDEO_MEMORY_SIZE; i += 2 )
00066         {
00067                 videoBuffer[i] = c;
00068                 videoBuffer[i + 1] = videoColor;
00069         }
00070 }

00072 void printAlarm ( void )
00073 {
00074 }
00075 
00076 void printBackspace ( void )
00077 {
00078         decCursor();
00079         videoBuffer[cursorOffset] = ' ';
00080         videoBuffer[cursorOffset + 1] = videoColor;
00081 }
00082 
00083 void printNewLine ( void )
00084 {
00085         do
00086         {
00087                 incCursor();
00088         } while ( cursorCol != 0 );
00089 }
00090 
00091 void printLineFeed ( void )
00092 {
00093         int col;
00094 
00095         printNewLine();
00096         col = cursorCol;
00097         do
00098         {
00099                 incCursor();
00100         } while ( cursorCol == col );
00101 }
00102 
00103 void printReturn ( void )
00104 {
00105         while ( cursorCol != 0 )
00106                 decCursor();
00107 }
00108 
00109 void printTab ( void  )
00110 {
00111         int i, prevRow;
00112 
00113 
00114         for ( i = 0, prevRow = cursorRow; i < tabStop; ++i )
00115         {
00116                 if ( prevRow != cursorRow )
00117                         break;
00118                 videoBuffer[cursorOffset] = ' ';
00119                 videoBuffer[cursorOffset + 1] = videoColor;
00120                 incCursor();
00121         }
00122 }
00123 
00124 void printVTab ( void )
00125 {
00126         int i, col;
00127 
00128         col = cursorCol - 1;
00129         for ( i = 0; i < vtabStop; ++i )
00130                 printNewLine();
00131         while ( cursorCol < col )
00132                 incCursor();
00133 }

00137 static int parseCharacter ( int c, int offset )
00138 {
00139         videoBuffer[offset] = c;
00140         return 1;
00141 }

00148 static void scrollScreen()
00149 {
00150         memcpy(videoBuffer, videoBuffer + (SCREEN_WIDTH * 2), VIDEO_MEMORY_SIZE - (SCREEN_WIDTH * 2));
00151         cursorRow = SCREEN_HEIGTH -1;
00152         cursorCol = 0;
00153         cursorOffset = getOffset(cursorRow, cursorCol);
00154         fillLine(' ');
00155 }
00156 
00157 static void refreshCursor ( void )
00158 {
00159         int temp;
00160 
00161         temp = inportb(CRTCAddress);
00162 
00163         outportb(CRTCAddress, VGA_CURSOR_POS_LOW_PORT);
00164         outportb(CRTCData, cursorOffset/2);
00165         outportb(CRTCAddress, VGA_CURSOR_POS_HIGH_PORT);
00166         outportb(CRTCData, (cursorOffset/2) >> 8);
00167         
00168         outportb(CRTCAddress, temp);
00169 }

00172 /*
00173  *      Public Function Section
00174  */
00175 
00176 void initVideo ( int cursorEnabled) 
00177 {
00178         int temp, temp2, miscVGARegister, CRTControler, cursorStart,
00179                 cursorEnd, maxScanLineRegister;
00180         /*
00181          *      Disabling blink-bit
00182          */
00183 
00184         inportb(VGA_INPUT_STATUS_REGISTER);
00185         temp = inportb(VGA_ADDRESS_DATA_REGISTER);
00186         outportb(VGA_ADDRESS_DATA_REGISTER, 0x10);
00187         temp2 = inportb(VGA_DATA_READ_REGISTER);
00188         temp2 &= 0xF7;
00189         outportb(VGA_ADDRESS_DATA_REGISTER, temp2);
00190         outportb(VGA_ADDRESS_DATA_REGISTER, temp);
00191         inportb(VGA_INPUT_STATUS_REGISTER);
00192 
00193         /*
00194          *      Getting VGA CRT Control registers Address
00195          */
00196         miscVGARegister = inportb(VGA_MISC_REGISTER);
00197         miscVGARegister &= 0x01; /*getting I/O Address select bit*/
00198         if ( miscVGARegister == 0x01 )
00199                 CRTControler = 0x03D0;
00200         else
00201                 CRTControler = 0x03B0;
00202 
00203         /*
00204          *      Initializing CRT Control Address and Data
00205          */
00206         CRTCData = CRTControler + 5;
00207         CRTCAddress = CRTControler + 4;
00208 
00209         /*
00210          * Defining Cursor Shape 
00211          */
00212         temp = inportb(CRTCAddress);
00213         
00214         outportb(CRTCAddress, VGA_MAX_SCAN_LINE_REGISTER);
00215         maxScanLineRegister = inportb(CRTCData);
00216         maxScanLineRegister &= 0x1F;
00217         outportb(CRTCAddress, VGA_CURSOR_START_REGISTER);
00218         cursorStart = inportb(CRTCData);
00219         cursorStart &= 0xE0;
00220         outportb(CRTCData, cursorStart);
00221         outportb(CRTCAddress, VGA_CURSOR_END_REGISTER);
00222         cursorEnd = inportb(CRTCData);
00223         cursorEnd &= 0xE0;
00224         cursorEnd += maxScanLineRegister;
00225         outportb(CRTCData, cursorEnd);
00226 
00227         outportb(CRTCAddress, temp);
00228         
00229         setCursorVisibility(cursorEnabled);
00230         refreshCursor();
00231 }
00232 
00233 void refreshScreen ( void ) {
00234         memcpy(videoMemory, videoBuffer, VIDEO_MEMORY_SIZE);
00235         refreshCursor();
00236 }
00237 
00238 void updateColor ( void )
00239 {
00240         int i;
00241         for ( i = 0; i < VIDEO_MEMORY_SIZE; i += 2 ) 
00242                 videoBuffer[i+1] = videoColor;
00243 }
00244 /* Cursor Movment Functions */
00245 
00246 int setCursorVisibility ( int b )
00247 {
00248         int temp, cursorDisabled;
00249 
00250         if ( b & !cursorVisibility )
00251         {
00252                 temp = inportb(CRTCAddress);
00253                 outportb(CRTCAddress, 0x0A);
00254                 cursorDisabled = inportb(CRTCData);
00255                 cursorDisabled &= 0xDF;
00256                 outportb(CRTCData, cursorDisabled);
00257                 outportb(CRTCAddress, temp);
00258                 cursorVisibility = !cursorVisibility;
00259         }
00260         else if ( (!b) & (cursorVisibility) )
00261         {
00262                 temp = inportb(CRTCAddress);
00263                 outportb(CRTCAddress, 0x0A);
00264                 cursorDisabled = inportb(CRTCData);
00265                 cursorDisabled |= 0x20;
00266                 outportb(CRTCData, cursorDisabled);
00267                 outportb(CRTCAddress, temp);
00268                 cursorVisibility = !cursorVisibility;
00269         }
00270 
00271         return cursorVisibility;
00272 }
00273 
00274 void incCursor ( void )
00275 {
00276         cursorOffset += 2;
00277         ++cursorCol;
00278         if ( cursorCol == SCREEN_WIDTH )
00279         {
00280                 cursorCol = 0;
00281                 ++cursorRow;
00282         }
00283         if ( cursorRow == SCREEN_HEIGTH )
00284                 scrollScreen();
00285 }
00286 
00287 void decCursor ( void )
00288 {
00289         if ( (cursorOffset -= 2) < 0 )
00290                 cursorOffset = 0;
00291         
00292         --cursorCol;
00293         if ( cursorCol == -1 )
00294         {
00295                 cursorCol = SCREEN_WIDTH - 1;
00296                 --cursorRow;
00297         }
00298         if ( cursorRow == -1 )
00299         {
00300                 cursorRow = 0;
00301                 cursorCol = 0;
00302         }
00303 }
00304 
00305 int setCursorPosition ( int row, int col )
00306 {
00307         if ( row >= SCREEN_HEIGTH || col >= SCREEN_WIDTH || row < 0 || col < 0 )
00308                 return -1;
00309         cursorOffset = getOffset(row, col);
00310         cursorRow = row;
00311         cursorCol = col;
00312         return cursorOffset;
00313 }
00314 
00315 void getCursorPosition ( int * row, int * col )
00316 {
00317         if ( row == NULL || col == NULL )
00318                 return;
00319         *row = cursorRow;
00320         *col = cursorCol;
00321 }

00361 void putCharAtCurrentPos ( int c, int color )
00362 {
00363         parseCharacter(c, cursorOffset);
00364         videoBuffer[cursorOffset + 1] = videoColor;
00365 }
00366 
00367 void printChar ( int c )
00368 {
00369         printColorChar(c, videoColor);
00370 }
00371 
00372 void printColorChar ( int c, int color )
00373 {
00374         int inc = parseCharacter(c, cursorOffset);
00375         videoBuffer[cursorOffset + 1] = color;
00376         if ( inc )
00377                 incCursor();
00378 }

00380 int putCharAtFixedPos ( int c, int color, int row, int col )
00381 {
00382         int i;
00383 
00384         if ( col >= SCREEN_WIDTH || row >= SCREEN_HEIGTH || col < 0 || row < 0 )
00385                 return 0;
00386         
00387         i = getOffset(row, col);
00388         parseCharacter(c, cursorOffset);
00389         videoBuffer[i + 1] = videoColor;
00390         
00391         return 1;
00392 }
00393 
00394 int putColoredStringAtFixedPos ( char * s, int * color, int length, int row, int col  )
00395 {
00396         int i, j;
00397 
00398         if ( col >= SCREEN_WIDTH || row >= SCREEN_HEIGTH || col < 0 || row < 0 )
00399                 return -1;
00400         
00401         for ( i = getOffset(row, col), j = 0; j < length && j < VIDEO_MEMORY_SIZE; ++i, ++j )
00402         {
00403                 parseCharacter(s[j], i++);
00404                 if ( color == NULL )
00405                         videoBuffer[i] = videoColor;
00406                 else
00407                         videoBuffer[i] = color[j];
00408         }
00409 
00410         return j;
00411 }

00414 {
00415         int i;
00416 
00417         for ( i = 0; i < VIDEO_MEMORY_SIZE; i += 2 ) 
00418         {
00419                 videoBuffer[i] = c;
00420                 videoBuffer[i+1] = videoColor;
00421         }
00422                 
00423 }

00425 void clearScreen ( void )
00426 {
